name: Tippy Toe 3D
description:
Super satisfactory walking simulator!

Try to walk to the finish line. Smash various objects, fidgets, bugs, but be careful and avoid the dangerous ones. Tap and hold to take a step.
It's super easy to learn but hard to be a walk master. Are you ready for the challenge?
Let’s take a world tour with lots of various levels, destroy cities, feel like a godzilla or a queen.
Choose from lots of fashionable clothes to create your perfect look!
Upgrade your character, get dressed with your style and choose between lots of supercool effects. You can even have a tattoo on your leg!!

Let’s play Tippy Toe 3D!!
